item.title: Folders in Obsidian
item.description: [!warning] Complaints against folders Folders classify notes too rigidly. Folders - a misunderstood hero A hierarchical folder structure based on folders and a naming system called Johnny Decimal: 1 2 Search: folders, anti-folders Folders search 1 2 3 ```query path:Attachments ``` Anti-Folders search 1 2 3 ```query path:-Attachments ``` Folder Note (plugin) GitHub repository

item.title: What is Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian is essentially a file editor, like notepad, wrapped around as a note taking tool, with an ambition to become a “second brain” for you.
